languages.text: Крохотный шаттл входит в астероидное поле и почти сразу сбивается с курса из-за космического мусора. Пилот совершает отчаянный маневр уклонения и облетает несколько обломков погибших судов древности... но задевает крылом небольшой астероид, отталкивая его навстречу ближайшей мине.

The minuscule shuttle enters the asteroid field and is almost immediately thrown off course by space debris. The pilot performs a desperate evasive manoeuvre and dodges several wrecks of these lost ships of antiquity... But the shuttle's wing clips a small asteroid, pushing it toward a nearby mine.
languages.original_text: Крохотный шаттл входит в астероидное поле и почти сразу сбивается с курса из-за космического мусора. Пилот совершает отчаянный маневр уклонения и облетает несколько обломков погибших судов древности... но задевает крылом небольшой астероид, отталкивая его навстречу ближайшей мине.

traits.locale_text: The minuscule shuttle enters the asteroid field and is almost immediately thrown off course by space debris. The pilot performs a desperate evasive manoeuvre and dodges several wrecks of the lost ships of antiquity... But the shuttle's wing clips a small asteroid, pushing it towards a nearby mine.

The minuscule shuttle enters the asteroid field and is almost immediately thrown off course by space debris. The pilot performs a desperate evasive manoeuvre and dodges several wrecks of the lost ships of antiquity... But the shuttle's wing clips a small asteroid, pushing it towards a nearby mine.

The minuscule shuttle enters the asteroid field and is almost immediately thrown off course by space debris. The pilot performs a desperate evasive manoeuvre and dodges several wrecks of these lost ships of antiquity... But the shuttle's wing clips a small asteroid, pushing it towards a nearby mine.

The minuscule shuttle enters the asteroid field and is almost immediately thrown off course by space debris. The pilot performs a desperate evasive manoeuvre and dodges several wrecks of these lost ships of antiquity... But the shuttle's wing clips a small asteroid, pushing it toward a nearby mine.

The minuscule shuttle enters the asteroid field and is almost immediately thrown off course by space debris. The pilot performs a desperate evasive manoeuvre and dodges several wrecks of these lost ships of antiquity... But the shuttle's wing clips a small asteroid, pushing it toward a nearby mine.

languages.text: 这艘微型穿梭机进入小行星区后，几乎立即被太空垃圾撞出了轨道。飞行员孤注一掷，以极限姿势进行躲避，勉强躲过几片失事船只的残骸，但机的机翼还是撞上了其中一颗小行星，继而撞上了附近的一颗虚空雷。
languages.original_text: The minuscule shuttle enters the asteroid field and is almost immediately thrown off course by space debris. The pilot performs a desperate evasive manoeuvre and dodges several wrecks of these lost ships of antiquity... But the shuttle's wing clips a small asteroid, pushing it toward a nearby mine.

traits.locale_text: 这艘微型穿梭机进入小行星区后，几乎立即被太空垃圾撞出了轨道。飞行员孤注一掷，以极限姿势进行躲避，勉强躲过几片失事船只的残骸，但机的机翼还是撞上了其中一颗小行星，继而撞上了附近的一颗虚空雷。

languages.text: 極小のシャトルは小惑星帯に入ったが、宇宙ゴミによってすぐにコースを外れる。パイロットは必死の回避操作を行い、古代に失われた船の残骸をいくつもかわす…しかし、シャトルの翼が小さな小惑星をはさみ、近くの機雷へと押しやった。
languages.original_text: The minuscule shuttle enters the asteroid field and is almost immediately thrown off course by space debris. The pilot performs a desperate evasive manoeuvre and dodges several wrecks of these lost ships of antiquity... But the shuttle's wing clips a small asteroid, pushing it toward a nearby mine.

traits.locale_text: 極小のシャトルは小惑星帯に入ったが、宇宙ゴミによってすぐにコースを外れる。パイロットは必死の回避操作を行い、古代に失われた船の残骸をいくつもかわす…しかし、シャトルの翼が小さな小惑星をはさみ、近くの機雷へと押しやった。

languages.text: La minúscula lanzadera se adentra en el campo de asteroides y casi de inmediato se desvía de su rumbo por culpa de los desechos espaciales. El piloto realiza una maniobra evasiva y esquiva varios restos de esas naves perdidas de la antigüedad... Pero el ala de la lanzadera choca contra un pequeño asteroide, empujándola hacia una mina cercana.
languages.original_text: The minuscule shuttle enters the asteroid field and is almost immediately thrown off course by space debris. The pilot performs a desperate evasive manoeuvre and dodges several wrecks of these lost ships of antiquity... But the shuttle's wing clips a small asteroid, pushing it toward a nearby mine.

traits.locale_text: La minúscula lanzadera se adentra en el campo de asteroides y casi de inmediato se desvía de su rumbo por culpa de los desechos espaciales. El piloto realiza una maniobra evasiva y esquiva varios restos de esas naves perdidas de la antigüedad... Pero el ala de la lanzadera choca contra un pequeño asteroide, empujándola hacia una mina cercana.

languages.text: Das winzige Shuttle fliegt in das Asteroidenfeld und wird fast unverzüglich von Weltraumschutt vom Kurs abgebracht. Der Pilot führt ein verzweifeltes Ausweichmanöver aus und schlängelt sich zwischen mehreren uralten Wracks hindurch ... Doch der Flügel des Shuttles streift einen kleinen Asteroiden und schubst ihn in Richtung einer Mine.
languages.original_text: The minuscule shuttle enters the asteroid field and is almost immediately thrown off course by space debris. The pilot performs a desperate evasive manoeuvre and dodges several wrecks of these lost ships of antiquity... But the shuttle's wing clips a small asteroid, pushing it toward a nearby mine.

traits.locale_text: Das winzige Shuttle fliegt in das Asteroidenfeld und wird fast unverzüglich von Weltraumschutt vom Kurs abgebracht. Der Pilot führt ein verzweifeltes Ausweichmanöver aus und schlängelt sich zwischen mehreren uralten Wracks hindurch ... Doch der Flügel des Shuttles streift einen kleinen Asteroiden und schubst ihn in Richtung einer Mine.

languages.text: À peine la minuscule navette a-t-elle pénétré dans le champ d'astéroïdes qu'elle est aussitôt déviée de sa trajectoire par des débris spatiaux. Au prix d'une manœuvre d'évitement désespérée, le pilote parvient à esquiver plusieurs épaves à la dérive depuis des temps immémoriaux... mais son aile percute un petit astéroïde et l'envoie valser vers une mine proche.
languages.original_text: The minuscule shuttle enters the asteroid field and is almost immediately thrown off course by space debris. The pilot performs a desperate evasive manoeuvre and dodges several wrecks of these lost ships of antiquity... But the shuttle's wing clips a small asteroid, pushing it toward a nearby mine.

Au prix d'une manœuvre d'évitement désespérée, le pilote parvient à esquiver plusieurs épaves à la dérive depuis des temps immémoriaux... mais son aile percute un petit astéroïde et l'envoie valser vers une mine proche.
